publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3601# John Farquhar Munro: Sabhal Mòr Ostaig Awarded Queens Anniversary Prize-That the Parliament congratulates Sabhal Mòr Ostaig on its outstanding achievement in winning the Queen's Anniversary Prize for Higher Education, a prize which is awarded in recognition of excellence, initiative and innovation; recognises the great progress Sabhal Mòr Ostaig has made since its origins in a derelict farm steading on Skye so that it is now Scotland's leading Gaelic education college, and considers that the Scottish Executive should honour Sabhal Mòr Ostaig by recognising it as a National Centre of Excellence for Gaelic Language and Culture.
S1M-3601# Sabhal Mor Ostaig Awarded Queens Anniversary Prize (lodged on 19 November 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-3601# Sabhal Mor Ostaig Awarded Queens Anniversary Prize (lodged on 19 November 2002) Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-3601# John Farquhar Munro: Sabhal Mor Ostaig Awarded Queens Anniversary Prize—That the Parliament congratulates Sabhal Mòr Ostaig on its outstanding achievement in winning the Queen’s Anniversary Prize for Higher Education, a prize which is awarded in recognition of excellence, initiative and innovation; recognises the great progress Sabhal Mòr Ostaig has made since its origins in a derelict farm steading on Skye so that it is now Scotland’s leading Gaelic education college, and considers that the Scottish Executive should honour Sabhal Mòr Ostaig by recognising it as a National Centre of Excellence for Gaelic Language and Culture. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Ms Sandra White*, Mary Scanlon*
S1M-3601# Sabhal Mor Ostaig Awarded Queens Anniversary Prize (lodged on 19 November 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-3601# Sabhal Mor Ostaig Awarded Queens Anniversary Prize (lodged on 19 November 2002) Fiona McLeod*
S1M-3601# Sabhal Mor Ostaig Awarded Queens Anniversary Prize (lodged on 19 November 2002) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Donald Gorrie*, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-3601# Sabhal Mor Ostaig Awarded Queens Anniversary Prize (lodged on 19 November 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-3601# Sabhal Mor Ostaig Awarded Queens Anniversary Prize (lodged on 19 November 2002) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3601# Sabhal Mor Ostaig Awarded Queens Anniversary Prize (lodged on 19 November 2002) Fergus Ewing*
